Sample code to convert .avi file to .mp4 with compression (almost no loss in quality)



```python
flist = glob.glob('media/video_origin/IM*.avi')

for file in flist:
  cmd = f"ffmpeg -i {file} -vcodec libx265 -crf 28 {file[:-4]}.mp4"
  os.system(cmd)
```
